translations: <英>燕麦粥，麦片粥；<英，非正式>关押期，监禁期

sentences.sentence: The prisoners subsisted on one mug of the worst quality porridge three times a day.
sentences.translation: 犯人一天三次靠一杯最差的粥维持生活。

sentences.sentence: Usually, it is porridge or beans; they have meat once a year.
sentences.translation: 通常是粥或豆子；他们一年吃上一次肉。
